languages.text:
"Купец Бездомный, колыбель тебе
Из плоти прелой не пришлась по нраву?
Ноктюрн Забвения уже звучит.
Я та мелодия, что дух студит,
И в пляс бросает сонмы обреченных.
Ты в их числе. Танцуй, и рок минует".

traits.locale_text:
"Купец Бездомный, колыбель тебе
Из плоти прелой не пришлась по нраву?
Ноктюрн Забвения уже звучит.
Я та мелодия, что дух студит,
И в пляс бросает сонмы обреченных.
Ты в их числе. Танцуй, и рок минует".

languages.text:
"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."
languages.original_text:
"Купец Бездомный, колыбель тебе
Из плоти прелой не пришлась по нраву?
Ноктюрн Забвения уже звучит.
Я та мелодия, что дух студит,
И в пляс бросает сонмы обреченных.
Ты в их числе. Танцуй, и рок минует".

traits.locale_text: "This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste? Oblivion comes now, and here its Nocturne plays into your ear. I am that strain that chills the soul, that doomed throngs pitches into dance. You are among them, Merchant Vagabond. So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste? Oblivion comes now, and here its Nocturne plays into your ear. I am that strain that chills the soul, that doomed throngs pitches into dance. You are among them, Merchant Vagabond. So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

languages.text:
“这腐肉的镣铐，莫非冒犯了你的喜好？
湮灭已然到来，它的夜曲在此地缭绕。
我是灿若星光，而又令人胆寒的乐章。
注定殒灭之人，伴着曲子将舞步踏响。
四处漂泊的商人，你也是其中一员。
请踏上我的舞台，逃离命运的威权。”
languages.original_text:
"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

四处漂泊的商人，你也是其中一员。
请踏上我的舞台，逃离命运的威权。”

languages.text:
「この腐敗した肉塊がお気に召さない？
忘却が到来し、ノクターンが流れる。
僕は魂を凍らせる星明かりの調べ
運命を背負った群衆が踊り出す曲。
放浪せし商人よ、君もそのひとり。
僕が唱えるステップを踏み、運命の掌握から逃れよ」
languages.original_text:
"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

languages.text:
«¿Esta cuna de carne pútrida ofende tus sentidos?
Aquí resuena el Nocturno. Aquí llega el Olvido.
Soy la tensión estrellada que hiela el alma,
la canción que bailan las enloquecidas masas.
Tú estás entre ellas, Mercader Errante:
sigue mi compás y escapa del fatídico desenlace».
languages.original_text:
"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

languages.text:
« Ce berceau de chair putride vous paraît-il offensant ?
L'Oubli vous accueille, et son Nocturne va jouer à présent.
Je suis l'étoile qui enveloppe l'âme de son étreinte glacée,
La mélodie qui force les foules damnées à danser.
Et vous, {mf|Marchand Vagabond|Marchande Vagabonde}, également.
Suivez mes pas, échappez au destin qui vous attend. »
languages.original_text:
"This crib of putrid flesh offends your taste?
Oblivion comes now. Here its Nocturne plays.
I am that starlit strain that chills the soul,
The piece that doomed throngs pitches into dance.
You are among them, Merchant Vagabond.
So tread the steps I say, escape fate's grasp."

Suivez mes pas, échappez au destin qui vous attend. »

languages.text:
"Beleidigt diese Krippe mit faulem Fleisch Euren Geschmack?
Nun kommt das Vergessen. Hier spielt seine Nocturne.
Ich bin der sternenerhellte Strang, der die Seele frösteln lässt,
das Stück, das verdammte Mengen zum Tanzen bringt.
Ihr gehört zu, Händlervagabund.
Also macht die Schritte, wie ich sage, zu entgehen dem Schicksalsgriff."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"Kokuşmuş etlerin yuvası, ağzına layık değil mi?
Sırada unutulmuşluk var. Noktürn sergiler gösterisini.
Yıldız ışığında ruhları ürperten bir şarkıyım,
Güruhları dansa mahkûm eden o son parçayım.
Pek Berduş Tüccar, sen de onlardan birisin.
Dediğim basamakları çık ki kaderinden kaçabilesin."
languages.original_text:
